description: Do you hide when someone mentions Microsoft Excel, or do you pretend to know more about it than you actually do. This course is designed from the bottom up, focusing on the most important elements of Microsoft Excel to give you the skills and confidence to perform everyday spreadsheet tasks in the average office. Have you used Excel before and now have moved over to Mac OS X, we will look at the main differences in the two versions and also show some useful tips so that you can become a compotent Microsoft Excel user
title: Microsoft Excel 2016 for Mac OS X - Office 365
